mainText.attr1: Object selection is done mainly via the left mouse button. Left click on a 3D object to select it.
Selecting Utilities:
Because you can select multiple friendly ships. If you hold down the SHIFT key you can add/remove ships to the selected list.
You can also - draw a selection rectangle - to select object(s).
This is done via holding down the left mouse button and dragging the mouse.
Via drawing the selection rectangle selecting multiple friendly ships is possible.
Because there is a variety of small and large objects selection attempts to be smart.
Small objects are prioritized - especially ships.
Selecting Shortcuts:
Select Current Player Ship - KEY -
Select Command Ship - KEY -
Select Nearest Friendly Base - KEY -
Select Nearest Friendly Shipyard - KEY -
Selecting Shortcuts Use:
Sometimes its nice to quickly focus on a particular object, double tap the above to select then focus on that object.
Extended Click Use:
Often double clicking has added functionality.
When a friendly SHIP is selected, clicking on its 3D model will select all ships of the same type.
When a friendly BASE is selected, clicking on its 3D model will open up its base management screen.
When a friendly SHIPYARD is selected, clicking on its 3D model will open up its ship building screen.
When a friendly GATE is selected, clicking on its 3D model will activate it or de-activate it (if other criteria are met).
Clicking on a object's target - selects that target.
